records.law_name: Utah Government Records Access and Management Act (GRAMA)
records.description: Fees must be reasonable and reflect actual costs
records.conditions: Fees must be reasonable and reflect actual costs

records.law_name: Utah Government Records Access and Management Act (GRAMA)
records.description: Cannot charge more than cost of fulfillment

records.law_name: Utah Government Records Access and Management Act (GRAMA)
records.description: May require payment before processing large requests
records.conditions: May require payment before processing large requests

records.law_name: Utah Government Records Access and Management Act (GRAMA)
records.description: Must provide estimate for requests exceeding $50
records.conditions: Must provide estimate for requests exceeding $50
